Team Big Ten Championships Years Michigan 42 1898 , 1901 , 1902 , 1903 , 1904 , 1906 , 1918 , 1922 , 1923 , 1925 , 1926 , 1930 , 1931 , 1932 , 1933 , 1943 , 1947 , 1948 , 1949 , 1950 , 1964 , 1969 , 1971 , 1972 , 1973 , 1974 , 1976 , 1977 , 1978 , 1980 , 1982 , 1986 , 1988 , 1989 , 1990 , 1991 , 1992 , 1997 , 1998 , 2000 , 2003 , 2004 Ohio State 36 ^ 1916 , 1917 , 1920 , 1935 , 1939 , 1942 , 1944 , 1949 , 1954 , 1955 , 1957 , 1961 , 1968 , 1969 , 1970 , 1972 , 1973 , 1974 , 1975 , 1976 , 1977 , 1979 , 1981 , 1984 , 1986 , 1993 , 1996 , 1998 , 2002 , 2005 , 2006 , 2007 , 2008 , 2009 , 2014 , 2017 Minnesota 18 1900 , 1903 , 1904 , 1906 , 1909 , 1910 , 1911 , 1915 , 1927 , 1933 , 1934 , 1935 , 1937 , 1938 , 1940 , 1941 , 1960 , 1967 Illinois 15 1910 , 1914 , 1915 , 1918 , 1919 , 1923 , 1927 , 1928 , 1946 , 1951 , 1953 , 1963 , 1983 , 1990 , 2001 Wisconsin 14 1896 , 1897 , 1901 , 1906 , 1912 , 1952 , 1959 , 1962 , 1993 , 1998 , 1999 , 2010 , 2011 , 2012 Iowa 11 1900 , 1921 , 1922 , 1956 , 1958 , 1960 , 1981 , 1985 , 1990 , 2002 , 2004 Michigan State 9 1953 , 1965 , 1966 , 1978 , 1987 , 1990 , 2010 , 2013 , 2015 Northwestern 8 1903 , 1926 , 1930 , 1931 , 1936 , 1995 , 1996 , 2000 Purdue 8 1918 , 1929 , 1931 , 1932 , 1943 , 1952 , 1967 , 2000 Chicago 7 1899 , 1905 , 1907 , 1908 , 1913 , 1922 , 1924 Penn State 1994 , 2005 , 2008 , 2016 Indiana 1945 , 1967 Nebraska 0 Maryland 0 Rutgers 0
